extendedInfo.description: This is a try before buy version of Unity Launcher. It test Unity Launcher is working on your device with Basic functions. Customization are available in Paid app only.Paid app linkhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.np.omkar.unityLiked Ubuntu Phone? Have you seen Ubuntu Phone Edge Launcher? Now test Ubuntu Apps switch Launcher on your Android phone even before Ubuntu launch ;-)Here it is Unity Launcher. A true MultiTasker's Launcher. First of it's kind for Android Platform.Features:1. Launch Applications from any where Just swipe Edges.2. Select apps to pin into launcher.3. Set swipe edge width,height, position and Color.Contact me on below page for bugs, suggestions.Support Page on XDA developers forum: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2123828First Screen Shot with Clock is Ubuntu Live Wallpaper and can be found here,https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.kivano.ubuntulwpPermissions Description-CALL_PHONE: DIRECTLY CALL PHONE NUMBERS :  Needed to add direct dial/call shortcuts to launcher.-READ PHONE STATUS AND IDENTITY : Needed for License checks.- READ_CONTACTS/READ_SMS/GET_ACCOUNTS/READ_CONTENT_PROVIDER: Missed call and unread SMS/Gmail notifications (paid version).

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: App is very reliable, haven\'t had any issues.   Only suggestion is that it would be nice if app icons would display a highlight to indicate that it was pressed. Often times I wait for a second or two before app launches not sure if the press registered.   Other than that though  good job!
reviews.author: Jaja Harris

reviews.title: In one word \"Perfect\".
reviews.comment: After going through a lot of free options, this one is the one for me. Really appreciate the work done by the developer.  Just two request.   Custom icon size and accordingly the width of the bar will change.  And keep the application free as long as you can.
reviews.author: Subham Sarkar

reviews.title: Thanks for Dev
reviews.comment: Very good. But there are some bug: can\'t sort items & it can show when use keyboard. After all it\'s the good one sidebar launcher, and it\'s free. :-)
reviews.author: ryanto arif

reviews.title: Love. But....
reviews.comment: Would get five stars if I didn\'t have to redo swipe edge settings with every app update, install, or deletion...
reviews.author: Herwin Torres

reviews.title: Dosen\'t even start
reviews.comment: It just keeps crashing all the time on my Acer iconia b1.Please bring a fix for this.
reviews.author: Vinayak Malviya

reviews.title: Galaxy s3
reviews.comment: Started crashing every time I use it.
reviews.author: Brett Inman

reviews.title: Works most of the time
reviews.comment: Difficult to use when you have a full screen widget. Don\'t like the little tab that is always present. Otherwise very good quick launcher.
reviews.author: Al Garcia

reviews.title: Amazing app
reviews.comment: Needs two things a setting to disable when certain apps are being used (games). Also when I hide my statusbar the unity launcher does not fill the gap. 5* anyways
reviews.author: Dylan Movchan

reviews.title: Nice, but ...
reviews.comment: There are umpteen of these on Play now. Most only have preselected apps on the bar. Convenient but not \"multi-tasking.\" This on integrates contacts/dialing while others do not which is great. I have been using two: homeflip with contacts-notification. Difference: Recently run (and/or still resident) apps appear on the bar instead of or in addition to preselected favorites. Favorites can be added from recently runs quite easily. One can choose how many apps as well.  So with inclusion of homeflip\'s recent apps functionality, this one would do the whole job.  BTW, this appears to be neither a launcher (trebuchet or stock is still there!) nor an overlay (such as homeflip), nor is it an accessibility-selected service. I like its seemless integration, wish others would follow suit!
reviews.author: David Baron

reviews.title: Suppap hai yaar
reviews.comment: Nice app for me an my mobile .......tab 2 maja aave che bhai aaama to....
reviews.author: rajput navdeep

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: This app is very amazing, very helpful as it improves user experience, plus it\'s quick and never lags.  One thing I noticed though, the recent apps widget isn\'t working, when I add it to the bar, it causes the launcher to either crash or won\'t do anything.. Nonetheless, I don\'t like the app any less.
reviews.author: Cesar Miniao

reviews.title: Great sidebar small bug.
reviews.comment: The sidebar doesn\'t reach the bottom of my screen and do it looks ugly. Great functionality though.  Sidebar pro looks good and has much the same function except no ability to add shortcuts, which sucks for a heavy user of tasker.  I\'d give this app 5 stars and definitely buy if it looked better.  It would also be nice to resize the bar as I have big clumsy fingers. :o)
reviews.author: David Gray

reviews.title: Good concept
reviews.comment: Great idea. I like what I\'ve seen of Ubuntu phone and this gives me a good flavour!
reviews.author: Nick Pearce

reviews.title: Preferred this to glovebox
reviews.comment: I tab at the edge the bar pops out n stays. I can swipe up n down to select my apps where as glovebox is a one swipe action. Making it harder to select the app you want when release your swipe
reviews.author: Goh Yong Li, Samuel

reviews.title: A must have
reviews.comment: At first, the function was glitchy ie the bar would not activate on gesture. But have messing with the settings, seems to work just fine. Great ap, a must have for anyone that needs to jump from one app to another without having to long press or minimize all windows.
reviews.author: Ackley Gaskin

reviews.title: What I expected
reviews.comment: I gave it a three or \"average\" because it leaves the left side of my keyboard virtually impossible to use. It makes those keys dead and creates an unpleasant usage. Other than that I love it
reviews.author: Anthony Ciccone

reviews.title: This is exactly what has been missing
reviews.comment: Only glitch I can find is that it crashes when launching the app drawer (as a shortcut in unity)  Other than that it\'s perfect AWESOME JOB!!!
reviews.author: Ben Carlson

reviews.title: last update is awful
reviews.comment: will lost apps in the pin list also the hot spot is changing to default all the time. please fix
reviews.author: Michael Shan

reviews.title: Not cool!
reviews.comment: The menu in the app is invisible. I can\'t do anything. It worked in the beginning... Uninstalling!
reviews.author: Adrian Fleser

reviews.title: Nice vry useful
reviews.comment: Gud bt need improvmnt.place a arrow indicator.when touch the arrow slide bar will show like s3 and note.automatically strt option when restart the phone.
